subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Only one bench spot is open for the Mets, and infielder Rubén Gotay is the leading candidate. But Olmedo Sáenz, a prolific pinch-hitter, could wind up being this year’s Julio Franco.
snippet: Only one bench spot is open for the Mets, and infielder Rubén Gotay is the leading candidate. But Olmedo Sáenz, a prolific pinch-hitter, could wind up being this year’s Julio Franco.
